dct_title_s: Reims plan fait sous la direction de la Renaissance des cités mission de G. B. Ford établi par la Municipalité de Reims
dct_description_sm: 'No. 28". This map is part of a series of plans executed under the auspices of "la Renaissance des cités mission", endowed with American funds, by George Burdett Ford an American architect and urban planner as a proposal to rebuild the city that was almost destroyed by the German bombardment during World War I.
dct_publisher_sm: Reims : direction de la Renaissance des cités mission de G. B. Ford, 1920.
